column2: Are there any improvements/ comments/ features that you'd like to contribute/ see?
column3: Add your contact number/ email address so we can contact you for a reward in case your suggestion is being utilized by our platform! (obviously only if the previous question has been answered)

column2: Search by multiple keywords would also be very great
